content: this crochet cardigan pattern is the perfect summer project stitched in light and comfortable patons linen this sweater comes together with ease featuring a treble_crochet x-stitch all-over repeat for the body to create a mesh the short sleeves are worked separately a tie-front closure plus single_crochet edges give your garment a polished look it s an essential summer layer over tanks and tees materials patons® linen™ 3 5 oz/100 g 275 yds/251 m sizes xs/s m l xl 2/3xl 4/5xl cauliflower 14002 3 3 4 4 5 5 balls gauges 17 single_crochet and 22 row = 4 10 cm with larger hook 6 x-sts and 4 row = 4 10 cm with larger hook in pat finished chest xs/s 38½ 98 cm m 42½ 108 cm l 46 118 cm xl 50½ 128 5 cm 2/3xl 58½ 148 5 cm
